official-title.#text:
To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
		  to prohibit a government subsidy or contribution for the premiums of a health
		  plan by a Member of Congress or Members’ staff or congressional leadership or
		  committee staff.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#tail: , and in addition to the Committee on

, for
			 a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for
			 consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the
			 committee concerned

short-title.#text:
No Special Deal for D.C. Insiders Act
			 of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 1312(d)(3)(D) of
			 the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1312/ss:d/p:3/sp:D

header.#text:
No
			 governmental health insurance premium subsidy or contribution for Members of
			 Congress and for congressional Members’ staff, leadership staff, and committee
			 staff

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , by inserting before the period at the end the following:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1312/ss:d/p:3/sp:D/cl:ii/scl:II

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
or a
			 leadership office of the

, Majority and Minority Leaders, Majority and Minority Whips,
			 Conferences of the Majority and of the Minority, and Majority and Minority
			 Policy Committees of the Senate) and employees of any committee of
			 Congress
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: President pro Tempore of the Senate

quote.#text:
, and
			 includes employees in a leadership office of the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1312/ss:d/p:3/sp:D/cl:ii
Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1312/ss:d/p:3/sp:D/cl:iv
Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1312/ss:d/p:3/sp:D/cl:i
Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1312/ss:d/p:3/sp:D/cl:i

text.#text:
Notwithstanding
				any other provision of law, no Federal funds shall be expended to pay or
				contribute to any portion of the premium for a health plan purchased by a
				Member of Congress pursuant to

header.#text:
No premium
				subsidy or contribution for members of congress

text.#text:
Notwithstanding
				any other provision of law, no Federal funds shall be expended to pay or
				contribute to any portion of the premium for a health plan purchased by
				congressional
				staff.

header.#text:
No premium
				subsidy or contribution for congressional staff
